sample(batch_size: int) → Dict[str, Any][source]¶

Random sample from dataset

Args:
batch_size (int): batch size to sample
Returns:
typing.Dict[str, typing.Any]: dict of outputs, ex: {“data”: subset, “targets”:targets}
